Once upon a time in a lush green garden, a snail named Sammy dreamed of winning the annual garden race. His friends laughed, thinking it impossible for a slow snail to compete with the speedy rabbits and swift birds. Undeterred, Sammy practiced every day, inching along the garden path. On race day, he faced fierce competitors, but they underestimated him. As they zoomed ahead, Sammy kept his steady pace, focused on the finish line. When the others grew tired and distracted, Sammy persisted, inching forward with determination. To everyone's surprise, he crossed the finish line first, proving that perseverance can conquer speed!
